info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 26 at 5:50PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A period of heavy snow showers will impact the Monida Pass area of southeastern Beaverhead County through at least 645 PM MDT... At 545 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of heavy snow showers over the town of Monida and Monida Pass. HAZARD...Heavy snow showers occurring. Snowfall rates are up to 1 inch per hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Visibility is being reduced to less than 1 mile over Monida Pass. Slushy, snow-covered, or icy roads will make travel difficult. Locations impacted include... Monida and Monida Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
